page.title: 13HOUSING IN LYDFORD
page.content: In Lydford we have quite a modern housing estate of bungalows and people who live there are mainly retired. There are about eighteen bungalows on Hawthorn Park estate.In Lydford there is a Terrace called Prince Charles Terrace and there are four houses there.There are some more houses down Silver Street and these houses are called Post War Council houses and they are older then Hawthorn Park estate. Most of the other houses in Lydford are lot older then the estates.These older houses are built of local stone with slate roofs. There are no thatched houses now but some of the houses were thatched many years ago. Lydford is in the Dartmoor National Park and a few years ago all the telephone lines were put under ground.
